attributes.additional_details:
I am sick of those who smoke and think that they are above all non-smokers. Although they may not smoke some smokers believe that they have the right to drag the likes of us non-smokers down along with them.The fumes that are produced are vile and disgusting and endangering the lives of many old and young human beings.

Don't get me wrong I do not have a problem with those who smoke but those who think it is okay to blindly rob the fresh air that we truly deserve.

I would be okay with public smoking but its the people who do not even ask if other people mind. Most smokers could be smoking right next to a person who suffers from asthma which could in the long term lead to the death of a everyday citizen.

Did you know that over 12,000 die from passive smoking alone in the UK.

All I want from this petition is for those who do smoke to take more consideration for those around them.
